name: onStateChange
desc: Fires when a source component has a state change

propSpec.desc: The id of the component we want to listen to state changes from
An array of id's of components we want to listen to state changes from
Key we want to listen to on the source component(s)
An array of keys we want to listen to on the source component(s)
When set to false the trigger will also fire when the source component has an empty string value

When set, state values on the source component will be set variables. e.g. snapshotKeys: [ 'value', 'disabled' ] will cause snapshot-value and snapsho-disabled to be set with the corresponding values from the source component to be set.
